titleStmt.title: A view of the court of St. Germain from the year 1690, to 95 with an account of the entertainment Protestants meet with there : directed to the malecontents Protestants of England.
titleStmt.author: Macky, John, d. 1726.

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of original in Huntington Library.
Attributed to John Macky. cf. NUC pre-1956.
